title: The new GOG versions of the Yakuza games omit multiple developers and even entire support studios from their credits
description: The missing Ryu Ga Gotoku staff is a bummer, but the snubbed support studios is just baffling.

title: Suds for the sud god: PowerWash sim is getting a Warhammer 40k crossover
description: Hose it down for the God-Emperor of Mankind.

title: Skyblivion team reveals roadmap to 2025 release, says quests and NPCs are done in 'around a third' of the map but The Shivering Isles will have to wait
description: "In regards to DLC, our focus is 100% on Skyblivion for now in order to release the base game at some point in 2025."

title: Every Warhammer 40,000 game, ranked
description: We played them all to determine which games about space marines, space orks, tech-priests and tyranids are worth your time.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #736: Sunday, June 25
description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: Anime action RPG Eternights is like a very horny Persona
description: Kickin' butts and makin' love at the end of the world.

title: Be a middle-manager in charge of hell's breaches in deckbuilding defense game Heretic's Fork
description: There's a demo to try, if you're quick.
